videos.title: 🧠 How to Iterate Over a Map in Go (Simple & Effective!)
videos.description:
🔥 Learn how to iterate over maps in Go the RIGHT way!

📌 In this short video, you'll discover:
- The simplest way to use `for range` in Go 🌀
- How to extract key-value pairs from maps 🔑
- A must-know Go technique for developers!

💡 Don't miss this Go tip that many overlook!

#golang #goprogramming #mapiteration #gocoding #golangtutorial #shorts #techshorts

videos.title: ⚠️ Go Map Iteration Mistake Devs Make (And How to Fix It)
videos.description:
🚫 Are you iterating over maps in Go the wrong way?

👨‍💻 In this video:
- How to use only keys when looping over Go maps 🧩
- Why accessing values inside the loop is better sometimes 💡
- Real-world examples from Go applications 🧪

✅ Watch now and clean up your Go code!

#golang #goerrors #gocodingtips #devshorts #techmistakes #goshorts

videos.title: 🔍 Why Sorted Map Iteration in Go Is a Game-Changer!
videos.description:
🧠 Want deterministic output from Go maps?

📊 Here's how to:
- Sort keys of a Go map using `sort.Strings()` 📚
- Iterate maps with predictable order 🔁
- Use slices with map keys for controlled access ✅

Don't leave Go randomness to chance—watch now!

#golang #gosortedmap #gocoding #golangtutorial #devtips #shorts
